languages.text: "Мой примитивный мозг был отмечен скверной... я все еще вижу их силуэты, слышу помехи, ощущаю сбои в аугментике... но все же я был спасен великой жертвой! О, блаженны деяния Омниссии и его благословение, укрывающее слабых от зла!"

traits.locale_text: "Мой примитивный мозг был отмечен скверной... я все еще вижу их силуэты, слышу помехи, ощущаю сбои в аугментике... но все же я был спасен великой жертвой! О, блаженны деяния Омниссии и его благословение, укрывающее слабых от зла!"
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: "My primitive brain has been marked by corruption... I still see their silhouettes, hear their interference, I sense the malfunctions in my augmetics... but I was still saved from the great sacrifice! Oh, blessed are the workings of the Omnissiah and His benediction that shelters the weak from evil!"
languages.original_text: "Мой примитивный мозг был отмечен скверной... я все еще вижу их силуэты, слышу помехи, ощущаю сбои в аугментике... но все же я был спасен великой жертвой! О, блаженны деяния Омниссии и его благословение, укрывающее слабых от зла!"

traits.locale_text: "My primitive brain has been marked by corruption... I still see their silhouettes, hear their interference, I sense the malfunctions in my augmetics... but I was still saved from the great sacrifice! Oh, blessed are the workings of the Omnissiah and His benediction that shelters the weak from evil!"
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: “我的原始大脑已经遭到了腐化……我依然能看到那些人的身影，听到他们的干扰。我能感觉到我的植入物出现了故障……但我并没有成为献祭的牺牲品！噢，赞美欧姆尼塞亚！祂的恩典让弱者免于邪恶的蛊惑！”
languages.original_text: "My primitive brain has been marked by corruption... I still see their silhouettes, hear their interference, I sense the malfunctions in my augmetics... but I was still saved from the great sacrifice! Oh, blessed are the workings of the Omnissiah and His benediction that shelters the weak from evil!"

traits.locale_text: “我的原始大脑已经遭到了腐化……我依然能看到那些人的身影，听到他们的干扰。我能感觉到我的植入物出现了故障……但我并没有成为献祭的牺牲品！噢，赞美欧姆尼塞亚！祂的恩典让弱者免于邪恶的蛊惑！”
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: «Mi cerebro primitido está lacrado por la corrupción... Aún veo sus siluetas, escucho su interferencia, siento los fallos en mis aumentos... ¡pero no caí en el gran sacrificio! ¡Oh, benditos son los caminos del Omnissiah y Su bendición, que protege a los débiles del mal!».
languages.original_text: "My primitive brain has been marked by corruption... I still see their silhouettes, hear their interference, I sense the malfunctions in my augmetics... but I was still saved from the great sacrifice! Oh, blessed are the workings of the Omnissiah and His benediction that shelters the weak from evil!"

traits.locale_text: «Mi cerebro primitido está lacrado por la corrupción... Aún veo sus siluetas, escucho su interferencia, siento los fallos en mis aumentos... ¡pero no caí en el gran sacrificio! ¡Oh, benditos son los caminos del Omnissiah y Su bendición, que protege a los débiles del mal!».
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: 「私の原始的な脳は堕落してしまいました…私にはまだ彼らのシルエットを見えているし、彼らの干渉が聞こえているし、オーグメティックの誤作動を感じるのです…ですが、それでも私は大いなる犠牲から救われたのです！ああ、万機神の御業と、弱き者を悪から守るご加護に幸いあれ！」
languages.original_text: "My primitive brain has been marked by corruption... I still see their silhouettes, hear their interference, I sense the malfunctions in my augmetics... but I was still saved from the great sacrifice! Oh, blessed are the workings of the Omnissiah and His benediction that shelters the weak from evil!"

traits.locale_text: 「私の原始的な脳は堕落してしまいました…私にはまだ彼らのシルエットを見えているし、彼らの干渉が聞こえているし、オーグメティックの誤作動を感じるのです…ですが、それでも私は大いなる犠牲から救われたのです！ああ、万機神の御業と、弱き者を悪から守るご加護に幸いあれ！」
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: "Mein primitives Gehirn wurde von der Korruption gezeichnet ... Ich sehe immer noch ihre Umrisse, höre ihre Interferenzen, spüre die Fehlfunktionen in meinen Augmentationen ... aber das große Opfer blieb mir erspart! Oh, gesegnet seien die Wege des Omnissiah und Seiner Segnung, die die Schwachen vor dem Bösen bewahrt!"
languages.original_text: "My primitive brain has been marked by corruption... I still see their silhouettes, hear their interference, I sense the malfunctions in my augmetics... but I was still saved from the great sacrifice! Oh, blessed are the workings of the Omnissiah and His benediction that shelters the weak from evil!"

traits.locale_text: "Mein primitives Gehirn wurde von der Korruption gezeichnet ... Ich sehe immer noch ihre Umrisse, höre ihre Interferenzen, spüre die Fehlfunktionen in meinen Augmentationen ... aber das große Opfer blieb mir erspart! Oh, gesegnet seien die Wege des Omnissiah und Seiner Segnung, die die Schwachen vor dem Bösen bewahrt!"
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: « La corruption a laissé sa marque sur mon cerveau primitif... Je vois toujours ces silhouettes, j'entends leurs interférences, je sens les dysfonctionnements de mes augmétiques... Pourtant, j'ai échappé au grand sacrifice ! Oh, loués soient les mécanismes de l'Omnimessie et Sa bénédiction qui protège les faibles du mal ! »
languages.original_text: "My primitive brain has been marked by corruption... I still see their silhouettes, hear their interference, I sense the malfunctions in my augmetics... but I was still saved from the great sacrifice! Oh, blessed are the workings of the Omnissiah and His benediction that shelters the weak from evil!"

traits.locale_text: « La corruption a laissé sa marque sur mon cerveau primitif... Je vois toujours ces silhouettes, j'entends leurs interférences, je sens les dysfonctionnements de mes augmétiques... Pourtant, j'ai échappé au grand sacrifice ! Oh, loués soient les mécanismes de l'Omnimessie et Sa bénédiction qui protège les faibles du mal ! »
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: "İlkel beynim, yozlaşmaya yenik düştü... Hâlen gölgelerini görebiliyor, parazitlerini duyabiliyor, ogmetiklerimdeki arızaları hissedebiliyorum... Yine de kurban edilmekten kurtuldum! Hermesih'in alametlerine ve mazlumları fenalıktan koruyan nimetlerine şükürler olsun!"
languages.original_text: "My primitive brain has been marked by corruption... I still see their silhouettes, hear their interference, I sense the malfunctions in my augmetics... but I was still saved from the great sacrifice! Oh, blessed are the workings of the Omnissiah and His benediction that shelters the weak from evil!"

traits.locale_text: “İlkel beynim, yozlaşmaya yenik düştü... Hâlen gölgelerini görebiliyor, parazitlerini duyabiliyor, ogmetiklerimdeki arızaları hissedebiliyorum... Yine de kurban edilmekten kurtuldum! Hermesih’in alametlerine ve mazlumları fenalıktan koruyan nimetlerine şükürler olsun!”
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest
